00088 inline int XMLDouble::compareValues(const XMLDouble* const lValue
00089                                   , const XMLDouble* const rValue)
00090 {
00091     return XMLAbstractDoubleFloat::compareValues((const XMLAbstractDoubleFloat*) lValue,
00092                                                  (const XMLAbstractDoubleFloat*) rValue 
00093                                                  , ((XMLAbstractDoubleFloat*)lValue)->getMemoryManager());
00094 }
